courses.title: Music Theory Essentials
courses.description: Learn the fundamentals of music theory, including scales, chords, and harmony.

courses.title: Mastering Guitar for Beginners
courses.description: Start your guitar journey with essential chords, strumming techniques, and simple songs.

courses.title: Electronic Music Production
courses.description: Create beats and tracks using FL Studio, Ableton Live, and modern production techniques.

courses.title: Piano for Everyone
courses.description: Learn how to play piano with step-by-step lessons designed for all skill levels.

courses.title: Vocal Training & Singing Techniques
courses.description: Improve your vocal range, pitch control, and confidence in singing.
